text: Nagano () is a city in Japan. It is the capital of Nagano Prefecture (). Nagano has been recognized as a core city since 1999.Jacobs, A.J. "Japan's Evolving Nested Municipal Hierarchy: The Race for Local Power in the 2000s," Urban Studies Research, Vol. 2011 (2011), p. 8 [PDF 8 of 14]. Retrieved 2012-12-5. As of October 1, 2007, 2,182,190 people lived in Nagano. ==History== In 1998, the Olympic Games were held in Nagano. ==References== Category:Cities in ChÅ«bu Category:Olympic cities Category:Settlements in Nagano Prefecture
title: Nagano (city)
